text: Hi Mozes!
What have I been hearing?
You are going on this HUGE adventure with big stuff and whatnot, slaying monsters and taking loot, and and and...
And you aren't taking me with you?
What's wrong with you!?
We've been friends since childhood, we always went on adventures together, and now you leave me hanging?
Who will be there to protect you? You need protection... From me! You do know that right?
Okay, here's the deal. You are taking me with you and MAYBE I'll forgive you.

choices.text: Alright Luana, I will endure your presence.
No, I don't WANT your protection.

text: Alright! Now were talking!
You are so not gonna regret this.
Ugh! This is so unfair!
Have you changed your mind?
Perhaps I don't wanna join you anymore.
But maybe if you beg me, I will consider it.

choices.text: Oh mighty Luana! I beg of you, please join me.

text: Ugh! Suit yourself!
Well, did you learn to count? Lemme join!
Mozes... I was always the best of us two at counting. I cannot join you if there's no room.
Are you back to beg me to join you?

choices.text: Yes, I would like you to come back.
No, I'm just here to gloat at you.

text: Ha! I knew it! You can't do without me!
Fine! I don't even wanna join you anymore!
Mozes... I was always the best of us two at counting. I cannot join you if there's no room.
No Mozes, if I leave, who is gonna tell you when you're being stupid?

choices.text: Luana, I think I can manage. You can go.
You're right, I want you to stay.

text: Ugh! This is so unfair!
